scripts.flask-dev: FLASK_DEBUG=1 pip3 install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m flask --app api/index run -p 8000 --reload
scripts.win-flask-dev: pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m flask --app api/index run -p 8000 --reload --debug
scripts.full-dev: concurrently "next dev" "FLASK_DEBUG=1 pip3 install -r requirements.txt && python3 -m flask --app api/index run -p 8000 --reload"
scripts.win-full-dev: concurrently "next dev" "pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m flask --app api/index run -p 8000 --reload"
